title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Gravel Ride Uruguay
content:
Photo submitted by Juan Acuña, “Taken during the recent day of the carnival holiday by gravel route in Uruguay.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Gravel Ride Uruguay appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
